dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to venture into the realm of fire and mystic energy, pitiful mortal. What do you seek here?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to challenge the flames and prove my strength.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish bravery. You will be nothing but ashes before the might of the Inferno Mystic Salamander.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not back down. Prepare for battle!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. The flames shall consume you, a futile end for a reckless intruder.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps I misjudged the situation. I'll make a strategic retreat.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ha! Cowardice befits you. Leave, and do not return to our fiery domain.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace. I seek knowledge and understanding of the mystic energies here.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Knowledge? Mortals are such amusing creatures. What use would the Inferno Mystic Salamander have for your feeble inquiries?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer my respect and wish to learn from your wisdom.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect from a mere mortal? Your words are hollow, but perhaps your presence may amuse me for a moment longer.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I mean no harm, I seek to understand and coexist with the mystic creatures of this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coexist? Ha! Your naivety knows no bounds. Leave before my patience runs thin.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I acknowledge your power and offer a pact of mutual benefit. We can aid each other in our respective endeavors.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A pact? Mutual benefit? Mortal, you speak of things beyond your grasp. What could you possibly offer the Inferno Mystic Salamander?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I possess knowledge of ancient rituals that could enhance your mystic abilities.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge, you say? Very well, mortal. Prove your worth, and perhaps our paths may intertwine momentarily.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have artifacts of great power that could amplify the flames of your sorcery.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Artifacts? Power? Intriguing... Very well, mortal. Show me these treasures of yours, but know that deceit will be met with swift retribution.
